com.helger.schematron.svrl

Class SVRLMarshaller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.helger.jaxb.AbstractJAXBMarshaller<SchematronOutputType>
      • com.helger.schematron.svrl.SVRLMarshaller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.helger.commons.lang.IHasClassLoader

    @NotThreadSafe
public class SVRLMarshaller
extends com.helger.jaxb.AbstractJAXBMarshaller<SchematronOutputType>
    This is the XML reader and write for Schematron SVRL documents. It reads XML DOM documents and returns SchematronOutputType elements and vice versa. The reading and writing itself is done with JAXB.
    Author:
    Philip Helger
